overview: Continuing Medical Education (CME) credit tracking module containing 44 classes for managing CME events, credit types, certificates, evaluations, financial reporting, connectivity/integration configuration, email distribution, course materials, guest presenters, learning objectives, and question management. Supports ACCME accreditation compliance requirements.

managerPattern.description: 11 manager classes following the Manager/Info pattern. Managers extend the base Manager class and use stored procedures for all data access. 8 managers have explicit Info counterparts.

storedProcedures.name: GetCMESatelliteProgramsDepartments
storedProcedures.purpose: Get departments participating in satellite programs

storedProcedures.name: GetSavedSatelliteProgramsDepartments
storedProcedures.purpose: Get saved satellite program department configurations

storedProcedures.name: ManageCMECredentialingInformation
storedProcedures.purpose: Create or update CME credentialing records

storedProcedures.name: GetCMEMaxEventCredits
storedProcedures.purpose: Get maximum allowable credits for a CME event

storedProcedures.name: GetCurrentYearStartDate
storedProcedures.purpose: Get the fiscal/academic year start date for financial calculations

storedProcedures.name: GetCMEFinancialResultsReport
storedProcedures.purpose: Generate detailed CME financial results report

storedProcedures.name: GetCertificatesForLookup
storedProcedures.purpose: Get certificate options for dropdown selection

storedProcedures.name: GetCertificateForDepartment
storedProcedures.purpose: Get certificates assigned to a specific department

storedProcedures.name: GetCreditTypeList
storedProcedures.purpose: List all credit types (AMA PRA Category 1, MOC, etc.)

storedProcedures.name: GetCreditTypesForLookup
storedProcedures.purpose: Get credit types for dropdown selection

storedProcedures.name: GetCreditTypeInfoByID
storedProcedures.purpose: Retrieve credit type details by ID

storedProcedures.name: DoesEventNameExists
storedProcedures.purpose: Check for duplicate event names (uniqueness validation)

storedProcedures.name: GetEmailDBListByCriteria
storedProcedures.purpose: Search email distribution lists by criteria

storedProcedures.name: AddCMEGuestPresenters
storedProcedures.purpose: Add guest/external presenter to CME event

storedProcedures.name: GetCMEGuestInfoByID
storedProcedures.purpose: Retrieve guest presenter details by ID

storedProcedures.name: GetCMEAudienceList
storedProcedures.purpose: Get target audience categories for CME questions

storedProcedures.name: DoesUploadNameExists
storedProcedures.purpose: Check for duplicate upload list names

storedProcedures.name: AddUploadEmailDBList
storedProcedures.purpose: Create a new email upload list

storedProcedures.name: spBulkImportUploadList
storedProcedures.purpose: Bulk import contacts from uploaded file

storedProcedures.name: DeleteUploadEmail
storedProcedures.purpose: Delete a single email from an upload list

storedProcedures.name: RestoreUploadUser
storedProcedures.purpose: Restore a deleted user from upload list

keyClasses.name: CMEBusinessClass
keyClasses.role: Primary business logic class for CME operations

keyClasses.name: CmeEventManager
keyClasses.role: CME event lifecycle management (create, schedule, register)

keyClasses.name: CerificateManager
keyClasses.role: CRUD for CME certificates (typo in name: should be CertificateManager)

keyClasses.name: CreditTypeManager
keyClasses.role: Manages credit types (AMA PRA Category 1, MOC, etc.)

keyClasses.name: CMEConnectivityManager
keyClasses.role: Third-party integration configuration (satellite programs, merchant services)

keyClasses.name: EvaluationInfo
keyClasses.role: Primary CME evaluation DTO with nested response models

keyClasses.name: UploadNameOfList
keyClasses.role: Bulk email list import/management with 9 stored procedures

businessRules: CME events must have credit types assigned (AMA PRA Category 1 is most common)
Certificate generation requires completed evaluation and attendance verification
Financial reporting spans fiscal/academic year boundaries (GetCurrentYearStartDate)
ACCME requires disclosure of commercial support sources (SupportSourceInfo)
Email distribution lists support soft-delete with restore capability
Bulk import uses dedicated stored procedure (spBulkImportUploadList) for performance
Event names must be unique across the department (DoesEventNameExists validation)
Satellite programs allow multi-department CME event sharing
Max event credits are configurable per credential type (GetCMEMaxEventCredits)

notes: Fix class name typos during migration: CerificateManager -> CertificateManager, CMEFinancialBussiness -> CMEFinancialBusiness
CMEConnectivityManager handles external integrations that may need REST API clients in NestJS
UploadNameOfList bulk import should use NestJS streaming/batch processing for large file uploads
Financial reporting stored procedures are complex and may be candidates for last-mile migration
EvaluationInfo and its 7 related DTOs in a single file should be split into separate files in NestJS
The Settings auto-generated class maps directly to NestJS ConfigModule
ACCME compliance features are regulatory requirements -- must be fully preserved
